name: Sooubway Run
description:
A game about the YouTuber theodd1sout that was made in three days for a game jam.This is a simple game where the player runs around trying to catch the correct ingredients (but not the incorrect ones) to make a sub sandwich and fill an order. There are some platforms to hop on but the mail focus is the food at Sooubway.

Code by Slick Craftians

Textures by theodd1sout

Video that inspired this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2yFCyPX3kT0
